name: Agentic Design Patterns Learning Platform Enhancement
description: Analyze and dramatically enhance the agentic design patterns learning platform with improved content, interactivity, visual design, and educational features
goal: Users can explore an incredibly polished, interactive learning platform that teaches agentic AI design patterns through beautiful visualizations, clickable code terms, interactive diagrams, quizzes, and comprehensive tutorials sourced from Jupyter notebooks

tasks.name: Codebase analyzed: full architecture map of current platform
tasks.intent: Cannot enhance what we don't understand - need complete picture of components, routes, data structures, and current feature state
tasks.description: Explore entire codebase structure, identify all chapters, components, data files, routing, styling patterns, and current feature completeness. Produce a mental model of what exists and what gaps need filling.
requires: Project directory exists and is accessible
guarantees: Identified all chapters and their completion state
tasks.validation: Read and catalog all key files: package.json, src/App.tsx, router config, chapter data files, component directory. List chapters with completion percentage.

tasks.name: Notebook content audited: all source notebooks cataloged with chapter mapping
tasks.intent: Chapters must be sourced from notebooks - need to know what notebook content exists and which chapters need content
tasks.description: Read all Jupyter notebooks in the notebooks directory, map each to its corresponding chapter, identify chapters missing tutorial content or with incomplete code examples.
guarantees: Every notebook mapped to a chapter
tasks.validation: List all notebooks with their chapter mapping and identify which chapters have complete tutorials vs incomplete/missing ones.

tasks.name: Build verified: project compiles and runs without errors
tasks.intent: Must have a working baseline before making any changes
tasks.description: Run the dev build, verify no compilation errors, check that the site loads and basic navigation works.
tasks.validation: Run npm run dev, navigate to localhost, verify homepage renders and at least one chapter page loads without console errors.

tasks.name: Current UX gaps documented: specific enhancement opportunities identified
tasks.intent: Need concrete list of improvements before implementing - prevents scattered work
tasks.description: Navigate entire site systematically, document specific UX issues: missing hover states, broken interactions, incomplete sections, visual inconsistencies, accessibility gaps, mobile responsiveness issues.
guarantees: Categorized by: visual, interactive, content, accessibility
Each issue has specific location and reproduction steps
tasks.validation: Produce categorized enhancement list with at least 10 specific, actionable items across visual polish, interactivity, and content completeness.

tasks.name: Visual theme enhanced: color system, typography, and spacing upgraded for premium feel
tasks.intent: The foundation of 'incredible' is visual polish - premium typography, refined spacing, and cohesive color palette
tasks.description: Upgrade the global CSS/Tailwind theme with improved color palette, refined typography scale, better spacing rhythm, and subtle design tokens that create a premium educational platform feel. Add smooth transitions and micro-interactions to base elements.
guarantees: Refined color palette with better contrast
tasks.validation: Take screenshots of homepage before and after. Verify improved visual hierarchy, smoother transitions on hover/click, and consistent spacing across at least 3 pages.
actions: Update Tailwind config with refined color palette

tasks.name: Navigation enhanced: sidebar/header polished with active states, smooth transitions, progress indicators
tasks.intent: Navigation is the user's primary interaction - it must feel premium and informative
tasks.description: Enhance navigation with smooth active state transitions, chapter completion progress indicators, breadcrumb improvements, and responsive mobile menu polish.
guarantees: Active chapter highlighted with smooth transition
Progress indicators visible for each chapter
tasks.validation: Navigate between 3+ chapters, verify active state transitions are smooth, progress indicators are visible, and mobile menu (resize to 375px) works correctly.
actions: Add active state animations to nav items

tasks.name: Chapter landing cards enhanced: hover effects, completion badges, visual hierarchy improved
tasks.intent: First impression of available content - must communicate value and progress at a glance
tasks.description: Upgrade chapter cards on the main page with premium hover effects (scale, shadow, glow), completion badges, difficulty indicators, and estimated reading time. Add staggered entrance animations.
guarantees: Staggered entrance animation on page load
Visual hierarchy clearly shows chapter order
tasks.validation: Load homepage, verify cards animate in with stagger, hover over cards to see premium effects, verify completion badges render correctly.
actions: Add hover scale/shadow/glow effects to cards
Add difficulty and reading time indicators

tasks.name: Code blocks enhanced: syntax highlighting improved, copy button, line numbers, language badges
tasks.intent: Code is the core content - must be beautiful and functional for learners
tasks.description: Upgrade all code blocks with improved syntax highlighting theme, line numbers, copy-to-clipboard button with feedback, language badge, and optional line highlighting for emphasis.
guarantees: All code blocks have line numbers
Copy button works with visual feedback
Language badge shows on each block
Syntax highlighting theme matches overall design
tasks.validation: Navigate to a chapter with code examples, verify line numbers display, click copy button and paste to confirm content copied, verify language badge visible, verify highlighted lines stand out.

tasks.name: Interactive diagrams enhanced: node hover tooltips, click animations, zoom controls
tasks.intent: Diagrams are the visual learning tool - must be engaging and informative
tasks.description: Enhance flow diagrams with smooth hover tooltips showing node details, click animations with visual feedback, zoom/pan controls, and improved edge styling with animated flow direction.
guarantees: Edge animations show data flow direction
Detail panel opens smoothly on node click
tasks.validation: Navigate to a chapter with a diagram, hover over nodes to see tooltips, click nodes to see animation and detail panel, use zoom controls, verify edge animations.
actions: Add hover tooltip component for diagram nodes

tasks.name: Navigation + Cards checkpoint: polished entry experience verified end-to-end
tasks.intent: Verify that the visual foundation, navigation, and cards work together as a cohesive entry experience
tasks.description: Checkpoint verifying that theme, navigation, and chapter cards create a premium first impression when a user arrives at the platform.
guarantees: Entry experience is cohesive and premium
No visual inconsistencies between nav and cards
tasks.validation: Fresh page load: verify staggered card entrance, navigate to chapter via card click, verify nav updates smoothly, navigate back, verify no visual glitches. Test at 1440px and 375px widths.
actions: Full flow test: load → browse cards → click chapter → nav updates → back
Test at desktop and mobile widths

tasks.name: Code + Diagrams checkpoint: interactive learning elements work together
tasks.intent: Code blocks and diagrams must work together - clicking diagram nodes should highlight code
tasks.description: Verify that diagram 'View in Code' links scroll to and highlight the correct code blocks, and that code term clicking works alongside diagram interactions without conflicts.
guarantees: Diagram node click → code scroll + highlight works
Code term click opens modal without breaking diagram state
No interaction conflicts between code and diagram features
tasks.validation: On a chapter with both diagram and code: click diagram node, verify it scrolls to code and highlights lines. Click a code term, verify modal opens. Return to diagram, verify state preserved.
actions: Test sequence: diagram click → code term click → diagram click

tasks.name: Missing chapter tutorials created: all chapters have complete tutorial content from notebooks
tasks.intent: Content completeness is essential - every chapter must teach effectively with notebook-sourced content
tasks.description: For each chapter identified as missing or incomplete tutorial content in T-101, create complete tutorial sections sourced from the corresponding Jupyter notebook. Include narrative, code, tips, warnings, exercises, and checkpoints following the CLAUDE.md structure rules.
guarantees: All code examples match notebook source
Tutorial sections follow required step types
Code terms added for new content
tasks.validation: Navigate to each chapter that was previously incomplete, verify tutorial section exists with narrative, code blocks, tips, and exercises. Verify code matches notebook source.
actions: Create tutorial sections with all required step types
Add code examples matching notebook exactly
Add code terms for new classes/methods

tasks.name: Code terms database expanded: all key classes, methods, and concepts are clickable with documentation
tasks.intent: Clickable code terms are the platform's unique learning feature - must be comprehensive
tasks.description: Audit all code blocks across all chapters, identify every key class, method, and concept that should be clickable. Add missing entries to codeTerms.ts with full documentation including syntax, parameters, return types, examples, tips, and doc URLs.
guarantees: Every key term in code blocks is clickable
Each term has complete documentation modal
Doc URLs point to valid official documentation
Pattern matching in TutorialCodeBlock covers all terms
tasks.validation: Navigate to 3 different chapters, click on key terms in code blocks (class names, method names), verify modal opens with syntax, parameters, examples, and working doc URL link.
actions: Audit all code blocks for key terms
Verify pattern matching covers new terms

tasks.name: Quiz system enhanced: better question types, visual feedback, score tracking
tasks.intent: Quizzes validate learning - must be engaging with clear feedback, not just checkboxes
tasks.description: Enhance the quiz system with multiple question types (multiple choice, true/false, code completion, drag-and-drop ordering), animated feedback on answer (confetti for correct, gentle shake for wrong), score tracking with progress bar, and explanations for wrong answers.
tasks.validation: Navigate to a chapter with quiz, answer questions correctly and incorrectly, verify correct shows positive feedback, wrong shows explanation, score updates visually, progress bar advances.
actions: Add score tracking with progress bar
Add explanation display for wrong answers

tasks.name: Learning progress persistence: localStorage tracks chapter completion, quiz scores, visited sections
tasks.intent: Users return to learn more - must remember where they left off
tasks.description: Implement localStorage-based progress tracking that remembers completed chapters, quiz scores, last visited section, and tutorial progress. Show this in the navigation and chapter cards.
guarantees: Chapter completion persists across page reloads
Quiz scores are saved and shown
Chapter cards show completion badges from stored data
tasks.validation: Complete a quiz, navigate away and back, verify score is preserved. Mark a chapter as read, reload page, verify completion state persists. Verify nav and cards reflect stored progress.
actions: Update nav to show stored progress
Update cards to show stored completion

tasks.name: Dark mode toggle: clean dark theme with smooth transition and preference persistence
tasks.intent: Modern learning platforms offer dark mode - reduces eye strain for long study sessions
tasks.description: Add a dark mode toggle with smooth CSS transition, persisted preference in localStorage, and system preference detection. Ensure all components (code blocks, diagrams, cards, modals) look great in dark mode.
guarantees: Dark mode toggle visible in header
All components render correctly in dark mode
System preference detected on first visit
tasks.validation: Click dark mode toggle, verify smooth transition, verify code blocks/diagrams/cards all look correct. Reload page, verify preference persisted. Check system preference detection.
actions: Audit all components in dark mode

tasks.name: Search functionality: instant search across chapters, code terms, and tutorial content
tasks.intent: As content grows, users need to find specific topics quickly
tasks.description: Add a search bar (Cmd+K shortcut) that searches across chapter titles, descriptions, code terms, and tutorial content. Show results in a modal with keyboard navigation and direct links to matched sections.
guarantees: Results link directly to matched section
tasks.validation: Press Cmd+K, type a pattern name, verify results show matching chapters and code terms. Use arrow keys to navigate, press Enter to go to result. Verify landing on correct section.
actions: Create search index from chapters and code terms

tasks.name: Content + Interactivity checkpoint: complete learning flow verified for one chapter
tasks.intent: Verify the full learning experience works end-to-end for a single chapter before checking all
tasks.description: Pick the most complete chapter and verify the entire learning flow: arrive via card, read tutorial with clickable terms, interact with diagram, view code examples from diagram links, complete quiz with feedback, see progress saved.
guarantees: Full learning flow works for one chapter
Progress correctly saved after completing chapter
tasks.validation: Full flow for one chapter: homepage → card click → tutorial read → click code terms → interact with diagram → diagram-to-code link → complete quiz → verify progress saved → return to homepage → verify completion badge.
actions: Execute full learning flow for chosen chapter

tasks.name: Animated hero section: eye-catching landing with animated pattern visualization and call-to-action
tasks.intent: First impression must be incredible - the hero section sets the tone for the entire platform
tasks.description: Create an animated hero section on the homepage with a subtle agentic pattern visualization (animated nodes connecting, data flowing), compelling headline, brief description, and clear call-to-action to start learning. Use CSS animations or lightweight canvas for performance.
tasks.validation: Load homepage, verify hero animation renders smoothly, headline is readable, CTA button is clickable and navigates to first chapter. Resize to mobile, verify simplified animation. Check prefers-reduced-motion.

tasks.name: Chapter transition animations: smooth page transitions between chapters and sections
tasks.intent: Smooth transitions between pages make the platform feel app-like and premium
tasks.description: Add page transition animations when navigating between chapters and sections. Content should fade/slide in, maintain scroll position context, and feel smooth and intentional.
tasks.validation: Navigate between 3 chapters, verify smooth fade/slide transitions. Use browser back button, verify smooth reverse transition. Check for layout shifts during transition.

tasks.name: Keyboard navigation: full keyboard accessibility for all interactive elements
tasks.intent: Accessibility is essential - keyboard users must be able to use all features
tasks.description: Ensure all interactive elements are keyboard accessible: tab order is logical, focus indicators are visible, diagrams can be navigated with arrow keys, code term modals can be opened/closed with keyboard, quizzes are fully keyboard-operable.
guarantees: Visible focus indicators on all interactive elements
Diagram nodes navigable with arrow keys
tasks.validation: Navigate entire chapter using only keyboard: Tab through nav, Enter to select chapter, Tab through tutorial, Enter on code term, Escape to close modal, Tab to diagram, arrows to navigate nodes, Tab to quiz, complete quiz with keyboard only.

tasks.name: Print-friendly styles: chapters printable as clean study materials
tasks.intent: Students often want to print or save chapters as PDF for offline study
tasks.description: Add print media styles that produce clean, readable chapter printouts. Hide navigation, interactive elements, and animations. Format code blocks with borders and line numbers. Add chapter title and page numbers.
guarantees: Chapter title appears on each page
tasks.validation: Open a chapter, trigger print preview (Cmd+P), verify clean layout with hidden nav, formatted code blocks, proper page breaks, and chapter title header.
actions: Add page header with chapter title

tasks.name: Full platform checkpoint: all features verified across all chapters
tasks.intent: Before final polish, verify that all features work across all chapters, not just one
tasks.description: Systematically verify that all enhanced features work correctly across every chapter: tutorials load, code terms are clickable, diagrams are interactive, quizzes work, progress saves, dark mode works, search finds content, keyboard navigation works.
guarantees: All features work across all chapters
No console errors on any page
tasks.validation: Visit every chapter, verify: tutorial loads, code terms clickable, diagram interactive, quiz works, dark mode toggles correctly. Run search for terms from each chapter. Check console for errors on every page.
actions: Verify all interactive features per chapter
Test dark mode on every page

tasks.name: Performance optimized: lazy loading, code splitting, image optimization, smooth 60fps
tasks.intent: Premium feel requires fast loading and smooth interactions
tasks.description: Optimize performance: add route-based code splitting, lazy load heavy components (diagrams, code highlighter), optimize any images, ensure animations run at 60fps, add loading skeletons for lazy content.
guarantees: Loading skeletons visible during lazy load
tasks.validation: Run Lighthouse audit, verify performance score > 90. Navigate between chapters, verify loading skeletons appear briefly for lazy content. Check animation smoothness with DevTools performance tab.
actions: Lazy load diagram and code highlighter components

tasks.name: SEO and meta tags: proper titles, descriptions, and Open Graph tags for each chapter
tasks.intent: Platform should be discoverable and shareable - proper meta tags for social sharing
tasks.description: Add proper document titles, meta descriptions, and Open Graph tags for each chapter page. Add structured data for educational content. Ensure each page has unique, descriptive metadata.
guarantees: Open Graph tags for social sharing
tasks.validation: Navigate to 3 different chapters, inspect document title changes, verify meta tags in page source, verify Open Graph tags present.
actions: Add document title management (React Helmet or equivalent)

tasks.name: Production build verified: platform builds, deploys, and delivers incredible learning experience
tasks.intent: Final deliverable - the user can build and use the enhanced platform
tasks.description: Run production build, verify no errors, verify all features work in production build, verify bundle size is reasonable, and deliver the final enhanced platform ready for deployment.
guarantees: Production build succeeds with no errors
All features work in production build
User can experience the full incredible learning platform
tasks.validation: Run npm run build, verify 0 errors. Serve production build, navigate full platform: hero animation → chapter cards → tutorial → code terms → diagram → quiz → progress → dark mode → search → print preview. All features work in production.
actions: Full end-to-end verification of all features
